Comments_List: I learned more about how philosophical thinkers apply that to film. I learned new ways of looking at films themselves as well as the experience of watching a film.

This course often had interesting discussion points and presented new ways of thinking about film. It did seem to have some crossover with FILM 150. In that regard it could reinforce many of the ideas presented in FILM 150.
I would probably recommend this course to another student. It has some interesting subject matter that can lead to interesting discussion.
